New_York.Hester Street (Manhattan):
Hester Street is a street in the Lower East Side of the New York City borough of Manhattan.
The street stretches from Essex Street to Centre Street, with a discontinuity between Chrystie Street and Forsyth Street for Sara Delano Roosevelt Park. There is also a discontinuity at Allen Street, which was created in 2009 with the rebuilding of the Allen Street Mall.
